name: LightBlue Environmental Consulting
description: LightBlue is an awarded Best Small Business: Good Food for All by the United Nations (among 2,000 applicants) with a vision to reconcile sustainability with business excellence. They specialize in food waste prevention through capacity building workshops, Food Intel Tech (FIT) — food waste monitoring tech, and Food Waste Prevention program to reduce food waste, cut operational expenses, and move towards zero food waste to landfill and low carbon operations. lightblueconsulting.com
